text: Confidence is a the emotion of someone being happy with what they know, look like and feel like. A positive example could be someone being happy with how they look. A negative example can be someone who thinks so highly of themselves that they act rude and better than everyone else. ==Related pages== * Arrogance * Dunningâ€“Kruger effect * Megalomania * Narcissism * Pride * Self- esteem ==References== Category:Emotions
title: Confidence
